title: Explore the Universe
prompt: Write about the vastness of the universe and the mysteries it holds.
description: This prompt encourages contemplation of space and its wonders.

title: Express Gratitude
prompt: Compose a letter expressing gratitude to someone who has positively impacted your life.
description: Spread positivity and appreciation through a heartfelt thank-you letter.

title: Invent a New Recipe
prompt: Create a unique recipe using unexpected ingredients and describe the flavor profile.
description: Challenge your culinary creativity with this inventive recipe prompt.
